title: What is BitcoinZ (BTCZ)?
subtitle: Equihash altcoin mining
body:
## Introduction to BitcoinZ

BitcoinZ (BTCZ) is a mineable equihash altcoin based on ZCash (ZEC) that allows fast, private, low-cost transactions. It had no premine, no ICO and there's no dev tax or founders reward. It's completely community-driven and the focus is decentralization, a theme that runs through every aspect of BitcoinZ. 

BitcoinZ Summary ||
-|-
Name | BitcoinZ
Ticker | BTCZ
Algorithm | Equihash
Type | Proof of Work (PoW)
Supply | 21 Billion
Block Reward | 12,500 BTCZ

## BitcoinZ's technology

BitcoinZ uses the equihash algorithm, which is an algorithm known for its ASIC (Application Specific Integrated Circuit) resistance. This means network hash is unlikely to be centralized with a few high-end computers. Anyone with a GPU or even CPU can mine and receive BTCZ.

The other key piece of technology in use is zk-SNARKS, which allows transactions to be stored on the blockchain completely encrypted, but still allows for verification and validation. In simpler terms, transactions can be proved valid without revealing any information about them. This allows for anonymous transactions along
